result.title: Assurant: Letting The Cat Out Of The Bag
result.text: Assurant is a niche P&C insurer with strong recent EPS growth, but earnings are highly sensitive to catastrophe losses. AIZ's Q3 2025 EPS beat was driven by unusually low catastrophe losses, not underlying business outperformance. Management reports focus on 'ex cat' results, masking the true volatility and risk from increasing catastrophe exposures.
